source:
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS gold;
set path_silver_d_products = 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_customers';
set path_silver_d_customers = 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_wh_data/';
set path_gold_d_products = 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_wh_data/';
set path_gold_d_customers = 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_wh_data/';


-- Załadowanie danych z warstwy Silver do tabeli Delta
-- Tworzenie tabel Delta w warstwie Silver
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE silver_d_products
USING DELTA
LOCATION ${path_silver_d_products};

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE silver_d_regions
USING DELTA
LOCATION ${path_silver_d_customers};

-- Tworzenie tabel w warstwie Gold
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE d_products
USING DELTA
LOCATION ${path_gold_d_products};

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE d_regions_gold
USING DELTA
LOCATION ${path_gold_d_customers};

-- Zmiana nazw kolumn w tabeli d_products i zapis do warstwy Gold
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE gold.d_products
SELECT 
    product_id AS IdProduct,
    product_name AS Name,
    brand_name AS Brand,
    sub_brand_name AS SubBrand,
    category_name AS Category
FROM silver.d_products;


-- Usuwanie duplikatów w tabeli d_regions i zapis do nowej tabeli Gold
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE gold.d_regions
USING DELTA
AS
SELECT DISTINCT 
    country_id AS IDCountry,
    cluster AS Claster,
    region_description AS Region,
    country AS Country
FROM silver.d_regions;
